snippet.title: #StayHome | Food Fight! 🎂| #SweetJustice | DC Super Hero Girls
snippet.description:
Find all new DC Super Hero Girls on DC Kids: https://bit.ly/39EBEH0

What is there to do when you've just started a new school and have a sneaking suspicion that some of your peers might be Super Heroes? FOOD FIGHT! 🍓🎂🌭

Join Wonder Woman™, Supergirl™, and the rest of the DC Super Hero Girls™ in an all-new action-packed paperback series! Get it here!: https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/606445/winner-takes-all-dc-super-hero-girls-by-erica-david-illustrated-by-hollie-mengert/

A new era of DC Super Hero Girls begins in DC Super Hero Girls: At Metropolis High! Get the Graphic Novel here: https://www.dccomics.com/graphic-novels/dc-super-hero-girls-2016/dc-super-hero-girls-at-metropolis-high

SUBSCRIBE: http://po.st/DCSuperHeroGirls_Sub

Be sure to watch on Cartoon Network and Netflix in the U.S.! 

Saving the day is super easy when you’re a Super Hero. But stopping evil in its tracks while keeping up grades and managing a social life, all before curfew? Ugh. That’s, like, super tough. DC Super Hero Girls are more than crime-fighting besties, they’re a diverse group of dedicated super-teens! Working together, they fight the battles of Metropolis and the battles of growing, up all at the same time. Always discovering new ways to control their powers and abilities, these awesome girls are quickly learning (sometimes the hard way) how to deal with the super challenges of being a teenage Super Hero.

We all have the power to make a difference. Just make sure to use it for good or you’ll find yourself up against those tenacious teens, the DC Super Hero Girls.

Connect with DCSHG Online:
Visit the official DCSHG WEBSITE: http://po.st/DC_SuperHeroGirls
Like DCSHG on FACEBOOK: http://po.st/DCSuperHeroGirls_FB
Follow DCSHG on INSTAGRAM: http://po.st/DCSuperHeroGirls_Instagram

https://www.youtube.com/c/dcsuperherogirls

All DC related characters and elements © & ™DC Comics. (s19)
